Package com.github.actionfx.core.converter

Class ConversionService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.actionfx.core.converter.ConversionService
  • public class ConversionService
extends java.lang.Object
    Service offering conversion routines.
    Author:
    koster

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static interface  ConversionService.ConverterFactory<S,​T>
      Factory interface for creating instances of converter.
      static class  ConversionService.ConvertiblePair
      A pair of source and target type, used as key for hashmap lookup.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ConversionService()
      Standard constructor that tries to retrieve a Locale from a potentially setup ActionFX instance.
      ConversionService​(javafx.beans.value.ObservableValue<java.util.Locale> localeProperty)
      Constructor accepting a Locale wrapped in an ObservableValue, so that changes to this ObservableValue are also affecting the convesion routines of this service.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConversionService

        public ConversionService()
        Standard constructor that tries to retrieve a Locale from a potentially setup ActionFX instance. In case there is no ActionFX instance is setup, the default system locale is taken.

      • ConversionService

        public ConversionService​(javafx.beans.value.ObservableValue<java.util.Locale> localeProperty)
        Constructor accepting a Locale wrapped in an ObservableValue, so that changes to this ObservableValue are also affecting the convesion routines of this service.
        Parameters:
        localeProperty - the locale obervable value

    • Method Detail

      • convert

        public <T> T convert​(java.lang.Object source,
                     java.lang.Class<T> targetType)
        Convert the given source to the specified targetType.
        Parameters:
        source - the source object to convert (may be null)
        targetType - the target type to convert to (required)
        Returns:
        the converted object, an instance of targetType

      • convert

        public <T> T convert​(java.lang.Object source,
                     java.lang.Class<T> targetType,
                     java.lang.String formatPattern)
        Convert the given source to the specified targetType.
        Parameters:
        source - the source object to convert (may be null)
        targetType - the target type to convert to (required)
        formatPattern - an optional, nullable format pattern (e.g. for NumberFormat)
        Returns:
        the converted object, an instance of targetType

      • convert

        public <T> T convert​(java.lang.Object source,
                     java.lang.Class<?> sourceType,
                     java.lang.Class<T> targetType,
                     java.lang.String formatPattern)
        Convert the given source to the specified targetType.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the target type
        Parameters:
        source - the source object to convert (may be null)
        sourceType - the source type (important, when source itself is null)
        targetType - the target type to convert to (required)
        formatPattern - an optional, nullable format pattern (e.g. for NumberFormat or DateTimeFormatter)
        Returns:
        the converted object, an instance of targetType

      • canConvert

        public boolean canConvert​(java.lang.Class<?> sourceType,
                          java.lang.Class<?> targetType)
        Checks, whether the given sourceType can be converted to targetType by this service.
        Parameters:
        sourceType - the source type
        targetType - the target type
        Returns:
        true, if this service is able to convert the given source type to the specified target type

      • createConverter

        protected <S,​T> java.util.function.Function<S,​T> createConverter​(java.lang.Class<S> sourceType,
                                                                             java.lang.Class<T> targetType,
                                                                             java.lang.String formatPattern)
        Creates a Converter for converting the given sourceType to targetType. In case there is no converter for handling these source and target types, null will be returned.
        Type Parameters:
        S - the source type parameter
        T - the target type parameter
        Parameters:
        sourceType - the source type
        targetType - the target type
        formatPattern - an optional, nullable format pattern (e.g. for NumberFormat)
        Returns:
        the created converter, or {@link null}, in case there is no converter available for the specified types

      • lookupConverterFactory

        protected <S,​T> ConversionService.ConverterFactory<S,​T> lookupConverterFactory​(java.lang.Class<S> sourceType,
                                                                                           java.lang.Class<T> targetType)
        Looks up the best fit converter factory that is registered in this conversion service. Considers the type hierarchy of sourceType.

        This method first tries to lookup the converter factory in cache via a fast lookup. In case the converter factory is not yet cached, the entire class hierarchies of the sourceType and targetType are checked.

        Parameters:
        sourceType - the source type
        targetType - the target type
        Returns:
        the looked up converter factory, or null, if no converter factory could be found

      • findConverterFactory

        protected <S,​T> ConversionService.ConverterFactory<S,​T> findConverterFactory​(ConversionService.ConvertiblePair convertiblePair)
        Finds a suiting converter factory by iterating over the entire class hierarchies of the source and target types of the ConversionService.ConvertiblePair.
        Type Parameters:
        S - the source type
        T - the target type
        Parameters:
        convertiblePair - the convertible pair
        Returns:
        the found converter factory, or null, if no converter factory could be found.
